Articles.Content:
Post about your landings and orbits at minimus.

My Orbits: Ice Moon Orbital Base (IMOB) (Space Station)

My Landings: None
Please provide more detail as to what you are wanting done?
This was the last transmission from Bob.

Landed with my Eagle MK7 there (resembles in Stockparts the Moonbase Alpha Space:1999 Eagle)

Dropped four parts of a mobile Moonbase you need at least 2 together to have a drivable Vehicle

After drop of the Station

Station fully operational

I finally got to Minimus a few days ago. It was only my second successful landing (after the Mun)

This is the embarrassingly over-sized lander/rocket. It was my first time using the LV-N engines and I didn't quite grasp how little fuel they need.

On arrival, Jeb and Bill got a nice view of Kerbin and the Mun.

Because there was so much spare fuel, I managed to come back on a polar orbit and dropped Bill and Jeb onto the Northern ice cap, which I hadn't visited yet.

I'd like to try and land on one of the high plateaus next time.
